participant_1.background:
I make sure to get plenty of exercise, even if my diet is not the best.
i like to build furniture.
my husband is a cop.
my favourite colour is green.
I'm looking forward to moving on to the next chapter in my life.

participant_2.background:
My first bike was a hand-me-down from my older brother.
i have gone 208 mph for for than 10 minutes.
I wear my boots as little as possible.
i owe 2 monitors for work.
my favorite band is tool.

content.text: I'm Sarah, nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too, Sarah! What are some of your interests?
I love to build furniture, exercise, and I'm looking forward to moving on to the next chapter in my life. What about you?
I love to ride my bike, and listen to the band Tool. I also owe 2 monitors for work, and I wear my boots as little as possible.
That's so cool! I've never been on a bike before, but I've always wanted to try. I love Tool too, they're my favorite band! I owe a few monitors for work too, but I don't wear boots at all.
Well, you're in luck! I have an extra bike that I'm not using, and you're welcome to borrow it. And if you ever need help with your monitors, I'm always happy to lend a hand.
That's so nice of you! Thank you! I'll definitely take you up on that offer.
No problem! It's always nice to meet new people.
